facts.1: Iced tea is a popular beverage in the United States, especially during the summer.
facts.2: The first known recipe for iced tea was published in 1879.
facts.3: Sweet tea, a variation of iced tea, is particularly popular in the Southern United States.

facts.1: The ballpoint pen was invented by László Bíró, a Hungarian-Argentinian inventor.
facts.2: The first commercially successful ballpoint pen was introduced in 1945.
facts.3: Ballpoint pens are now one of the most common writing instruments in the world.

facts.1: Herbs and spices have been used for thousands of years for culinary and medicinal purposes.
facts.2: The spice trade was one of the earliest drivers of globalization.
facts.3: Common herbs include basil, parsley, and thyme, while common spices include cinnamon, pepper, and turmeric.
